recipe.title: Spicy Peanut Ramen Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: To a pot with 2 cups (480 ml) of boiling water add the ramen seasoning packet and a tablespoon of butter. Stir until the butter melts and then add the ramen noodle cube and cook until the noodles become tender, 2 minutes. Pour the ramen into a bowl.
To the prepared ramen, add the peanut butter, Sriracha, and sesame oil and stir to incorporate.
Garnish with the peanuts, cilantro, jalapeño, and a lime wedge.
